contest-event.event-date:
May 2, 1885 D Airdrie Contest
Airdrie Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Airdrie Contest airdrie-contest
Airdrie, North Lanarkshire, Scotland, UK March contest - 1st Baillieston, 2nd Tillicoutry, 3rd Kirkmuirhill. 11 bands played. Sources: The Dundee Courier & Argus and Northern Warder (Dundee, Scotland), Tuesday, May 05, 1885; pg. 7; Issue 9925. http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc40.htm
March 22, 2012, 11:03 a.m. Aug. 29, 2016, 6:26 a.m.
1 Cambusnethan Charles E. Murdoch
2 Monklands Youth Concert Brass Charles E. Murdoch
3 Newmains Band William Chalmers
Unknown Result 9th L.R.V. (Kirkmuirhill) W. Maddock
Unknown Result Alloa Colliery John McBeath
Unknown Result Armadale Burgh William Muirhead
Unknown Result Baillieston W. B. Howell
Unknown Result Bonnybridge & District James Jenkins
Unknown Result Croy Silver Band G. St. Clair Jones
Unknown Result Larkhall Raploch James Hutchens
Unknown Result Tillicoultry James Jenkins
